abstract: A veteran of the Obama and Clinton administrations, Neera Tanden, will lead the Center for American Progress, whose progressive viewpoint reflects a disaffected element of President Obama's base.
snippet: A veteran of the Obama and Clinton administrations, Neera Tanden, will lead the Center for American Progress, whose progressive viewpoint reflects a disaffected element of President Obama's base.

headline.main: New Leader for Liberal Research Group
